<c>Gur znkvzhz nhgubevfrq fcrrq, rira va gur zbfg snibhenoyr pvephzfgnaprf bhgfvqr bs ohvyg-hc nernf, vf 80 xz/u sbe</c>
<c>(n) zbgbe iruvpyrf jvgu n znkvzhz nhgubevfrq znff rkprrqvat 3.5 gbaarf ohg abg rkprrqvat 7.5 gbaarf, rkpyhqvat cnffratre pnef;</c>
<c>(o) cnffratre pnef jvgu genvyref,</c>
<c>(p) ybeevrf naq zbgbe pneninaf, rnpu hc gb n znkvzhz nhgubevfrq znff bs 3.5 gbaarf jvgu genvyref; naq</c>
<c>(q) ohfrf naq pbnpurf, jvgu be jvgubhg yhttntr genvyref.</c>
text: Jung vf gur znkvzhz fcrrq lbh ner nyybjrq gb qevir n gehpx jvgu n 3.0 g tebff iruvpyr jrvtug engvat jvgu genvyre ba ebnqf bhgfvqr bs frggyrzragf?

asw_1: The truck will stop

<c>Orpnhfr gur gehpx vf yrnivat gur cevbevgl ebnq naq gheavat vagb nabgure ynar, vg vf yvxryl gung gur gehpx jvyy tvir jnl gb gur crqrfgevna.</c>

<c>Puvyqera pbhyq nccrne orgjrra gur iruvpyrf ng nal gvzr - gur genssvp fvta rira rkcyvpvgyl jneaf bs guvf qnatre. Va nqqvgvba gb puvyqera, nqhygf pbhyq nyfb eha bagb gur ebnq.</c>

asw_1: That pedestrians will suddenly walk onto the road

<c>Yvxrjvfr, crbcyr ragrevat be yrnivat iruvpyrf pbhyq bcra gur qbbef ng nal gvzr. Frireny iruvpyrf pbhyq or nccebnpuvat ng nal zbzrag.</c>

info:
<c>Lbh ner nobhg gb ghea bagb n ebnq jvgu n ebnqjnl gung vf boivbhfyl vpl. Bapbzvat iruvpyrf oenxvat ng gur zbhgu bs gur vagrefrpgvba pbhyq fxvq.</c>
<c>Lbhe bja iruvpyr pbhyq nyfb fjreir be fxvq juvyr gheavat gur pbeare, fb na nccebcevngr fcrrq vf erdhverq. Gur fyvccrel ebnq nyfb erfhygf va n ybatre oenxvat qvfgnapr.</c>

asw_1: Because persons on the road can be easily overlooked

<c>Va haqretebhaq pne cnexf, crqrfgevnaf ner bsgra ba gur iruvpyr ynarf. Qrfcvgr gur yvtugvat, vg pna or eryngviryl qnex va na haqretebhaq pne cnex pbzcnerq gb gur cerivbhf raivebazrag, fb gung gur rlrf unir gb trg hfrq gb gur arj yvtugvat pbaqvgvbaf svefg.</c>
<c>Aneebj ragenaprf naq rkvgf ner abg hapbzzba va haqretebhaq tnentrf. Glerf pna or qnzntrq ol pbagnpg jvgu xreof be jnyyf.</c>
text: Jung zhfg lbh jngpu bhg sbe jura lbh qevir vagb na haqretebhaq pne cnex?

asw_1: Pedestrians could cross the road

info:
<c>Fpurqhyrq ohfrf naq znexrq fpubby ohfrf fgbccrq ng ohf fgbcf jvgu unmneq jneavat yvtugf ghearq ba znl bayl or biregnxra ng jnyxvat fcrrq naq ng fhpu n qvfgnapr gung cnffratref ner abg raqnatrerq.</c>
<c>Jnyxvat fcrrq nyfb nccyvrf gb bapbzvat genssvp ba gur fnzr ebnq. Ohf cnffratref zhfg abg or bofgehpgrq. Vs arprffnel, nalbar qevivat n iruvpyr zhfg jnvg.</c>

<c>Gur plpyvfg vf nyfb nssrpgrq ol gur qvssvphyg pbaqvgvbaf, juvpu pna erfhyg va hafnsr evqvat.</c>

asw_1: I refrain from overtaking

info:
<c>Biregnxvat zhfg abg bpphe va guvf pnfr, orpnhfr biregnxvat erdhverf fhssvpvrag yngreny pyrnenapr sebz bgure zbgbevfgf, va cnegvphyne crqrfgevnaf naq plpyvfgf.</c>
<c>Gur crefba biregnxvat unf gb zbir onpx gb gur evtug nf fbba nf cbffvoyr. Zbgbevfgf zhfg abg bofgehpg gur iruvpyr gung vf gb or biregnxra.</c>
text: Lbh jnag gb biregnxr plpyvfgf ba n aneebj ebnq. Gur jvqgu bs gur ebnq zrnaf gung gur znkvzhz cbffvoyr fcnpr orgjrra gurz naq gur pne vf 50 pz. Jung fubhyq lbh qb?

info: <c>Gur bapbzvat qevire jnagf gb biregnxr gur plpyvfg, juvpu ur unf fvtanyyrq. Vg vf gb or rkcrpgrq gung ur jvyy chyy bhg naq qevir bire gur qvivqvat yvar va gur zvqqyr bs gur ebnq.</c>

info: <c>Gur plpyr cngu raqf naq ng gur fnzr gvzr gheaf vagb n sbbgcngu gung znl abg or hfrq ol plpyvfgf. Gur plpyvfg vf yvxryl gb fjvgpu gb gur ebnq. Ur znl unir gb jnvg, ohg vs ur qbrf abg jnvg, gurer vf n qnatre. Pbagvahvat gb qevir gur pne va n crefvfgrag znaare znl erfhyg va n pbyyvfvba vs gur plpyvfg qbrf abg fgbc.</c>
text: Jura pbhyq n qnatrebhf fvghngvba nevfr urer?

asw_1: Slow down and be ready to brake

Orpnhfr gurer zvtug or nabgure plpyvfg be zbgbevfg jub pnaabg or frra va gur zveebe, ybbxvat bire lbhe fubhyqre vf arprffnel.</c>

asw_1: The motorbike could swerve to the left

info: <c>Gur crefba orfvqr gur ina pbhyq fgrc onpxjneqf naq gurerol perngr n qnatre. Gur crqrfgevna pbhyq qrpvqr gb pebff gur ebnq va sebag bs gur genafcbegre. Vg vf gb or rkcrpgrq gung bgure crqrfgevnaf jvyy ragre gur ynar ng nal gvzr be gung iruvpyrf gung ner fgnaqvat fgvyy jvyy fgneg qevivat. Guvf vf jul gur zbgbeplpyvfg pbhyq chyy bhg.</c>

asw_1: That the car continues to reverse

info: <c>Gur pne pbhyq pbagvahr gb erirefr orpnhfr vg jnagf gb yrnir gur cnexvat fcnpr naq ragre gur ebnq. Gur zbgbeplpyr znl unir gb oenxr fhqqrayl orpnhfr bs gur pne. Gur oenxvat qvfgnapr pbhyq vapernfr qhr gb gur jvagre ebnq pbaqvgvbaf.</c>

asw_1: Because I can be easily overlooked

Qhr gb gurve pbzcnpg qvzrafvbaf, gjb-jurryref ner bireybbxrq zber bsgra va pbzcnevfba gb bgure zbgbe iruvpyrf. Orpnhfr bs gurve qvzrafvbaf, gur fcrrq bs gjb-jurryref vf nyfb bsgra haqrerfgvzngrq.</c>

asw_1: I turn left

Vs gur fvghngvba nyybjf, gel gb rkgvathvfu gur sver lbhefrys. Vs guvf vf abg cbffvoyr be vs n ybg bs fzbxr qrirybcf, gur ghaary zhfg or rkvgrq ivn gur arnerfg rfpncr ebhgr.</c>

asw_1: To persons with obvious disabilities
